Hi Sophia,

Just a quick follow-up on my note — I was keeping an eye out for your confirmation and answers for the transfer, so I wanted to check in in case it got buried.

Hope your week’s off to a good start!

Hi Sophia,

Take care, and wishing you a smooth rest of the week!

Hi All. The transfer is on pause this week. Will confirm Monday. Thank you!

Get Outlook for Android

Hi Sophie,

Hope you're doing well! We just wanted to check in and confirm—will you be hosting the new website with us?

If yes:
We'll copy niwart.tech/investmenttreds over to our staging site and begin working on the new terms template (hidden pages) alongside the SMTP setup. This will make it easy for us to push everything live. Also, could you please confirm if you'll be using the domain https://investmenttrends.com/?

If no:
That's absolutely fine too—we'll just need SFTP access to the current site (since it's custom coded), and we'll take care of the rest.

Either way, we're excited to get started and ensure everything runs smoothly for you. Looking forward to your confirmation!

Really appreciate your help—thank you!

Hey InvestmentTrends Team,


Hope you're all having a great day—greetings from the Wolf IQ Support team!

Just a quick heads-up: it looks like our support email (support@wolfiq.com.au) no longer has access to niwart.tech/wp-login.php. We're currently unable to continue the page migration process without that account.

Could you kindly share the updated login credentials (email and password), using our support email?

Really appreciate your help, and let us know if you need anything from our side to get this sorted.

Hey Sophie,

Thanks for looping us in—and hope your afternoon OOO goes smoothly!

In terms of cost, we charge based on time spent. For this task:
  • 6 pages would take around 55 minutes
  • 10 pages would take about 70 minutes
    (Both include the setup of the custom legacy page template.)

Our rate is AU$109 per hour.

Let us know which way you'd like to go, and we’ll be ready to get started.

As always, happy to help if anything else pops up!

Thanks so much Wolf

g.johnston@investmenttrends.comj.shan@investmenttrends.com - as I am OOO from 130pm today and tomorrow could you please share the priority pages for transfer.

Hi Sophie,

Thanks so much for the clarification—this all makes perfect sense now.

Just to recap what you’re asking for:
  • Move 6–10 priority legacy pages (like T&Cs and Privacy pages) over to the new niwart.tech site
  • These pages should temporarily feature the old Investment Trends logo (attached below) rather than the new one (also attached below), even though they’ll sit within the new site
  • This is a short-term fix until the broader logo rollout is ready

If that’s correct, the simplest approach would be to apply a slightly different page template for these legacy pages—same design, just with the old logo swapped in.

We’re happy to get this sorted for you—feel free to send over the list of priority pages

Looking forward to getting this in place for you!

Hi Wolf Team

As mentioned in my email we have a bunch of legacy pages - they are T&Cs and Privacy pages that relate to our surveys. These are not publicly available on our website but are used as live links for our surveys and take the user back to a page that will sit within our site and under the investmenttrends.con URL.

We have an issue where we are not in a position to roll out our new logo on these pages so my question is if we were to share with you the 6 to 10 priority pages that need to be moved over to the new site are you able to show these pages on the new website (on a temporary) basis but only feature the OLD logo at the top of the page?

If you could please confirm if possible and best/easiest approach.

See an example of the page here - Terms & Conditions Qtr4 - Investment Trends

Note this is a short-term fix for the next few weeks until we go live across all marketing assets with the new logo. We will start with the website which we are launching but are not ready to show the new logo on these materials yet.

Thanks
Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie and Ivan,

Thanks again for reaching out to Wolf IQ support—and apologies for the delay in getting back to you!

A couple of quick things to help keep things moving:
  • For the local hosting and SMTP setup, we're happy to hand over the staging domain records for niwart.tech, so you can use them for your local environment.
  • Sophie, just wanted to clarify your note from yesterday:
    “What we need to do in the short term as we transition our logo across to other survey assets is move about 6 to 10 documents over to the new site but they will need to feature the old logo—it can be on the new design but we need to remove the new logo and feature the old.”
    Could you help us understand what you'd like us to do here?

Also, just to confirm—will there be no legacy pages moving over anymore?

Let us know if we’ve got that right, or if there’s anything else we can help with!

Hi Wolf Team and ivan@niwart.io

Introducing you to Ivan from our web design/development team.

Can you both please connect to discuss - as we need to move to local hosting today and discuss SMTP for email routing for launch

It would be great if you could cc me in on the communications and progress.

Thanks
Sophie
